title: Publish MR Enterprises draft site to IC mainnet (deployment-only)

requirements.summary: Publish the existing MR Enterprises marketing site to IC mainnet by following and completing the deployment + verification checklist in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md.
acceptanceCriteria: Run the production build step successfully (npm run build) and confirm a dist/ output is produced.
Deploy the frontend canister to IC mainnet successfully (dfx deploy --network ic) with no deployment errors.
On the live canister URL, confirm the site loads without requiring authentication or preview access.
On the live site, confirm all primary sections render without errors: Header, Hero, Gallery, Collections, Benefits, Contact, Footer.
On the live site, verify navigation links smooth-scroll to the correct sections (Gallery, Collections, Contact).
On the live site, verify all images render correctly (hero background, gallery images, logo assets).
On the live site, verify contact details match the configured values (phone and email) and related links work (tel: and mailto:).
On the live site, verify mobile responsiveness, including the mobile menu behavior.
On the live site, verify both light and dark themes render correctly.
On the live site, verify gallery filtering and image modal/lightbox behavior work as expected.
On the live site, verify all CTAs are clickable and functional.

file_operations.description: Align the documented deployment steps and post-deployment verification checklist to exactly match REQ-22 acceptance criteria (build produces dist/, deploy to IC mainnet, live URL verification with no auth required, section rendering checks, smooth-scroll nav checks, image rendering checks including hero/gallery/logo assets, tel:/mailto: link verification against frontend/src/config/contact.ts, mobile menu behavior, light/dark theme checks, gallery filtering + modal behavior, and CTA click-through checks). Keep changes documentation-only; do not alter site functionality.
